aboutUs.content: WOPR is a specialist association with a nationwide range, established on the basis of order No. 74 of the Chairman of the Main Committee of Physical Culture of April 11, 1962, obtained legal personality on October 9, 1967 based on the decision of the Minister of the Interior. WOPR units are units cooperating with the State Medical Rescue system.
